channel.title: Pages on tTales
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on tTales

item.title: Now
item.description: Staying home and avoiding Covid-19. And trying to stay away from negative news channels, as much as possible. Everyone has some agenda of their own. Everyone wants to prove that their handling of the pandemic is somehow better than all others. It’s just sickening! Hauptfokus I am working on a piece of software that will be able to make videos by itself (only a specific type of video). I’m also taking an online course by Jeremy Howard, Introduction to Machine Learning for Coders.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Hans Ollivander (Han5 011ivand3r). I am a student and dreamer. As a student, I ask questions and seek for digestible answers. Generally, it is followed by me trying to contradict my brain with wrong answers. And a dreamer, because that’s where freedom is. I am passionate about human space exploration, machine learning and storytelling. I consume books, articles, podcasts and documentaries on them. And talk to people about them (Not as much I want to!
